Articles.Content:
I'm requesting this because I have attempted to get a launchpad + miner to the Mun, and it ended with big explosions. Several times.

You can use all and any mods you want/need, but there HAS to be Kethane mining, Kethane storage, and Kethane Conversion, and KAS. If there is MJ, great, but if not, I'll place it myself.
